banner.title: Open Source Situation Insight
banner.description: By analyzing global open source projects, gain insight into the development trends of global open source import and export, communities, technology fields, developers, programming languages, and licenses.

push.title: Open Source Contribution Development Trend
push.desc: Code contribution (Push count) development trends for global TOP30 countries and regions, China TOP30 cities, reflecting the actual participation and contribution scale of countries and regions in the open source field.

import_export.title: Open Source Import and Export Contribution Development Trend
import_export.desc: Development trends of open source import and export contributions in global TOP30 countries and regions, reflecting the degree of open source collaboration between countries and regions.

repositories.title: Active and New Open Source Project Development Trend
repositories.desc: Development trends of active open source projects (with code submissions in the current year) and annual new (created in the current year) project numbers in global TOP30 countries and regions, reflecting the open source innovation vitality and sustainable development capabilities of countries and regions.

topics.title: Technology Field Code Contribution and Developer Development Trend
topics.desc: Development trends of global TOP17 technology fields in code contribution, analyzing code contributions, active developer numbers, and new developer numbers in various technology fields in countries and regions, reflecting the technical directions of open source investment in countries and regions.

contributor.title: Active and New Developer Development Trend
contributor.desc: Development trends of active (with code submissions in the current year) and new (registered and with code submissions in the current year) open source developer numbers in global TOP30 countries and regions, reflecting differences and trends in developer ecosystems across countries.

language.title: Programming Language Active Project Development Trend
language.desc: Development trends of active open source repository numbers for programming languages in different global regions, reflecting programming language preferences and differences in different countries and regions.

license.title: License Application and Development Trend
license.desc: Development trends of active open source repository numbers for Licenses in different global regions, reflecting differences in License usage in different countries and regions and the influence of different Licenses.

categories.china_language: China Programming Language Active Project Numbers

importExport.ratio_quarterly: Import and Export Contribution to Total Contribution Ratio (Quarterly)
importExport.top30_import_export: Top30 Import and Export Push Volume
importExport.ratio_chart: Top30 Import and Export to Global Total Push Volume Ratio Chart

description.topics: Based on a 10% sample of all GitHub projects from 2022-2024, the research covers approximately 5 million active open source projects, deeply analyzing the development trends of the 17 technology fields with the largest global code contributions.

dependency.global_import_export_contribution: Global Open Source Import and Export Contribution
dependency.description: Open source import and export contribution is an important indicator for measuring the degree of open source collaboration between countries and regions. It is defined as the amount of code contributed by developers from one country or region to open source projects in other countries or regions, i.e., "export", and the amount of code contributed by developers from other countries or regions to open source projects in that country or region, i.e., "import". The code amount here refers to the actual amount of code written by developers in open source projects, usually measured by the number of commits and lines of code.
